name: UploadCustomCostsFile
description:
Upload a custom costs file to Datadog.

This tool uploads a custom costs file to Datadog. Use it when you need to update or input new cost data into the system.

parameters.name: custom_costs_data
parameters.description: An array of JSON objects specifying each line item's billing details. Each item should contain BilledCost, BillingCurrency, ChargeDescription, ChargePeriodStart, ChargePeriodEnd, ProviderName, and optional Tags.

BilledCost.description: Total cost in the cost file.

BillingCurrency.description: Currency used in the Custom Costs file.

ChargeDescription.description: Description for the line item cost.

ChargePeriodEnd.description: End date of the usage charge.

ChargePeriodStart.description: Start date of the usage charge.

ProviderName.description: Name of the provider for the line item.

Tags.description: Additional tags for the line item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
